017package org.microbean.qualifier;
018
019import java.lang.constant.Constable;
020import java.lang.constant.ConstantDesc;
021import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
022import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
023import java.lang.constant.MethodTypeDesc;
024
025import java.util.Optional;
026
027import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
028import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
029import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.DEFAULT_NAME;
030import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.NULL;
031
032import static java.lang.constant.DirectMethodHandleDesc.Kind.INTERFACE_STATIC;
033
034import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualified;
035import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_QualifiedRecord;
036import static org.microbean.qualifier.ConstantDescs.CD_Qualifiers;
037
038/**
039 * A {@link Constable} pairing of a {@link Qualifiers} and an {@link
040 * Object} that is qualified by them.
041 *
042 * @param <K> the type borne by the keys of the {@link Qualifiers} in
043 * this {@link Qualified}
044 *
045 * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the {@link Qualifiers}
046 * in this {@link Qualified}
047 *
048 * @param <T> the type of the object that is qualified; note that if it
049 * does not extend {@link Constable} then a {@link Qualified} bearing
050 * it will return an {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty
051 * <code>Optional</code>} from its {@link #describeConstable()} method
052 *
053 * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
054 * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
055 *
056 * @see Qualifiers
057 *
058 * @see Constable
059 */
060public interface Qualified<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T> extends Constable {
061
062
063  /*
064   * Instance methods.
065   */
066
067
068  /**
069   * Returns this {@link Qualified}'s {@link Qualifiers}.
070   *
071   * @return this {@link Qualified}'s {@link Qualifiers}
072   *
073   * @nullability Implementations of this method must not return
074   * {@code null}.
075   *
076   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
077   * and deterministic.
078   *
079   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
080   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
081   */
082  public Qualifiers<K, V> qualifiers();
083
084  /**
085   * Returns this {@link Qualified}'s qualified object.
086   *
087   * @return this {@link Qualified}'s qualified object, which may be
088   * {@code null}
089   *
090   * @nullability Implementations of this method may return {@code null}.
091   *
092   * @idempotency Implementations of this method must be idempotent
093   * and deterministic.
094   *
095   * @threadsafety Implementations of this method must be safe for
096   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
097   */
098  public T qualified();
099
100  /**
101   * Returns an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
102   * describing this {@link Qualified}, if this {@link Qualified} is
103   * capable of being represented as a <a
104   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
105   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link
106   * Optional} if not.
107   *
108   * @return an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
109   * describing this {@link Qualified}, if this {@link Qualified} is
110   * capable of being represented as a <a
111   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
112   * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty} {@link
113   * Optional} if not
114   *
115   * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
116   * return {@code null}.
117   *
118   * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
119   * idempotent and deterministic.
120   *
121   * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe for
122   * concurrent use by multiple threads.
123   *
124   * @see <a
125   * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">Dynamically-computed
126   * constants</a>
127   */
128  @Override // Constable
129  public default Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
130    final T qualified = this.qualified();
131    final ConstantDesc qualifiedCd;
132    if (qualified == null) {
133      qualifiedCd = NULL;
134    } else if (qualified instanceof Constable c) {
135      qualifiedCd = c.describeConstable().orElse(null);
136    } else if (qualified instanceof ConstantDesc cd) {
137      qualifiedCd = cd;
138    } else {
139      return Optional.empty();
140    }
141    final ConstantDesc qualifiersCd = this.qualifiers().describeConstable().orElse(null);
142    if (qualifiersCd == null) {
143      return Optional.empty();
144    }
145    // Call Qualified.of(qualifiers, qualified) to rehydrate.
146    return
147      Optional.of(DynamicConstantDesc.ofNamed(BSM_INVOKE,
148                                              DEFAULT_NAME,
149                                              CD_Qualified,
150                                              MethodHandleDesc.ofMethod(INTERFACE_STATIC,
151                                                                        CD_Qualified,
152                                                                        "of",
153                                                                        MethodTypeDesc.of(CD_Qualified,
154                                                                                          CD_Qualifiers,
155                                                                                          CD_Object)),
156                                              qualifiersCd,
157                                              qualifiedCd));
158  }
159
160
161  /*
162   * Static methods.
163   */
164
165
166  /**
167   * Returns a {@link Qualified}, which may or may not be newly
168   * created, representing the supplied qualified object.
169   *
170   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualified}'s {@link
171   * Qualifiers}' {@linkplain Binding#attributes() attribute keys}
172   *
173   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualified}'s {@link
174   * Qualifiers}' {@linkplain Binding#value() value} and {@linkplain
175   * Binding#attributes() attribute values}
176   *
177   * @param <T> the type of the qualified object
178   *
179   * @param qualified the qualified object; may be {@code null}
180   *
181   * @return a {@link Qualified}
182   *
183   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
184   *
185   * @idempotency This method is neither idempotent nor deterministic.
186   *
187   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
188   * threads.
189   *
190   * @see #of(Qualifiers, Object)
191   */
192  public static <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T> Qualified<K, V, T> of(final T qualified) {
193    return Record.of(qualified);
194  }
195
196  /**
197   * Returns a {@link Qualified}, which may or may not be newly
198   * created, representing the supplied {@link Qualifiers} and
199   * qualified object.
200   *
201   * @param <K> the type of the {@link Qualified}'s {@link
202   * Qualifiers}' {@linkplain Binding#attributes() attribute keys}
203   *
204   * @param <V> the type of the {@link Qualified}'s {@link
205   * Qualifiers}' {@linkplain Binding#value() value} and {@linkplain
206   * Binding#attributes() attribute values}
207   *
208   * @param <T> the type of the qualified object
209   *
210   * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null}
211   *
212   * @param qualified the qualified object; may be {@code null}
213   *
214   * @return a {@link Qualified}
215   *
216   * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
217   *
218   * @idempotency This method is neither idempotent nor deterministic.
219   *
220   * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
221   * threads.
222   */
223  // Called by #describeConstable().
224  public static <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T> Qualified<K, V, T> of(final Qualifiers<K, V> qualifiers, final T qualified) {
225    return Record.of(qualifiers, qualified);
226  }
227
228
229  /*
230   * Inner and nested classes.
231   */
232
233
234  /**
235   * A {@link Qualified} {@link java.lang.Record}.
236   *
237   * @param <K> the type borne by the keys of the {@link Qualifiers} in
238   * this {@link Qualified.Record}
239   *
240   * @param <V> the type borne by the values of the {@link Qualifiers}
241   * in this {@link Qualified.Record}
242   *
243   * @param <T> the type of the object that is qualified; note that if
244   * it does not extend {@link Constable} then a {@link Record}
245   * bearing it will return an {@linkplain Optional#empty() empty
246   * <code>Optional</code>} from its {@link #describeConstable()}
247   * method
248   *
249   * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null} in
250   * which case the return value of {@link Qualifiers#of()} will be
251   * used instead
252   *
253   * @param qualified the object being qualified; may be {@code null}
254   *
255   * @author <a href="https://about.me/lairdnelson"
256   * target="_parent">Laird Nelson</a>
257   */
258  public static final record Record<K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T>(Qualifiers<K, V> qualifiers, T qualified)
259    implements Qualified<K, V, T>, Constable {
260
261
262    /*
263     * Constructors.
264     */
265
266
267    /**
268     * Creates a new {@link Record}.
269     *
270     * @param qualified the object being qualified; may be {@code
271     * null}
272     *
273     * @see #Record(Qualifiers, Object)
274     */
275    public Record(final T qualified) {
276      this(Qualifiers.of(), qualified);
277    }
278
279    /**
280     * Creates a new {@link Record}.
281     *
282     * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null}
283     * in which case the return value of {@link Qualifiers#of()} will
284     * be used instead
285     *
286     * @param qualified the object being qualified; may be {@code
287     * null}
288     */
289    public Record {
290      if (qualifiers == null) {
291        qualifiers = Qualifiers.of();
292      }
293    }
294
295
296    /*
297     * Instance methods.
298     */
299
300
301    /**
302     * Returns an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
303     * describing this {@link Record}, if this {@link Record} is
304     * capable of being represented as a <a
305     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
306     * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty}
307     * {@link Optional} if not.
308     *
309     * @return an {@link Optional} housing a {@link ConstantDesc}
310     * describing this {@link Record}, if this {@link Record} is
311     * capable of being represented as a <a
312     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">dynamic
313     * constant</a>, or an {@linkplain Optional#isEmpty() empty}
314     * {@link Optional} if not
315     *
316     * @nullability This method does not, and its overrides must not,
317     * return {@code null}.
318     *
319     * @idempotency This method is, and its overrides must be,
320     * idempotent and deterministic.
321     *
322     * @threadsafety This method is, and its overrides must be, safe
323     * for concurrent use by multiple threads.
324     *
325     * @see <a
326     * href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/17/docs/api/java.base/java/lang/invoke/package-summary.html#condycon">Dynamically-computed
327     * constants</a>
328     */
329    @Override // Constable
330    public final Optional<? extends ConstantDesc> describeConstable() {
331      return Qualified.super.describeConstable();
332    }
333
334
335    /*
336     * Static methods.
337     */
338
339
340    /**
341     * Returns a {@link Record}, which may or may not be newly
342     * created, representing the qualified object.
343     *
344     * @param <K> the type of the {@link Record}'s {@link Qualifiers}'
345     * {@linkplain Binding#attributes() attribute keys}
346     *
347     * @param <V> the type of the {@link Record}'s {@link Qualifiers}'
348     * {@linkplain Binding#value() value} and {@linkplain
349     * Binding#attributes() attribute values}
350     *
351     * @param <T> the type of the qualified object
352     *
353     * @param qualified the qualified object; may be {@code null}
354     *
355     * @return a {@link Record}
356     *
357     * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
358     *
359     * @idempotency This method is neither idempotent nor deterministic.
360     *
361     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
362     * threads.
363     *
364     * @see #of(Qualifiers, Object)
365     */
366    public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T> Record<K, V, T> of(final T qualified) {
367      return of(Qualifiers.<K, V>of(), qualified);
368    }
369
370    /**
371     * Returns a {@link Record}, which may or may not be newly
372     * created, representing the supplied {@link Qualifiers} and
373     * qualified object.
374     *
375     * @param <K> the type of the {@link Record}'s {@link Qualifiers}'
376     * {@linkplain Binding#attributes() attribute keys}
377     *
378     * @param <V> the type of the {@link Record}'s {@link Qualifiers}'
379     * {@linkplain Binding#value() value} and {@linkplain
380     * Binding#attributes() attribute values}
381     *
382     * @param <T> the type of the qualified object
383     *
384     * @param qualifiers the {@link Qualifiers}; may be {@code null}
385     *
386     * @param qualified the qualified object; may be {@code null}
387     *
388     * @return a {@link Record}
389     *
390     * @nullability This method never returns {@code null}.
391     *
392     * @idempotency This method is neither idempotent nor deterministic.
393     *
394     * @threadsafety This method is safe for concurrent use by multiple
395     * threads.
396     */
397    public static final <K extends Comparable<? super K>, V, T> Record<K, V, T> of(final Qualifiers<K, V> qualifiers, final T qualified) {
398      return new Record<>(qualifiers, qualified);
399    }
400
401
402  }
403
404}
